_sText:
Was a bonus for a map that isn't happening so I turned it into a bhop map, made within a day or two so it's not perfect in terms of aesthetics but still pretty fun to run in my opinion. Very fast paced especially towards the end, and I tried to make this a bit harder to one shot than my other maps since one of the main critiques I tend to get is that my maps are 'too easy to run'

Also has a 25-30s bonus.


Have fun.

Here's a shitty vid I made of a segment a friend did incase anyone wants to see the gameplay.
